body:
Fixes #427.

## Description

The original motivation was to discard any LaTeX code that otherwise ended up in the paragraph text.

However, it also became clear that there is a number of other sub-elements in the paragraphs that need to be carefully processed. See #427 and the comments therein for more information.

## How to test?
Run
```bash
pytest tests/database/test_article.py::TestPubmedXMLArticleParser
```
to make sure the unit tests still work.

Additionally, you can used the code snippet in https://github.com/BlueBrain/Search/pull/437#issuecomment-915388992 and visually check the output parse.

## THE BIG QUESTION
is if we should handle `<inline-formula>` and `<disp-formula>` better than just replacing them by a placeholder. We might need the potential data inside, but parsing could be a nightmare. Potential for a new issue.

## Checklist

- [x] This PR refers to an issue from the [issue tracker](https://github.com/BlueBrain/Search/issues).
  (if it is not the case, please create an issue first).
- [x] Unit tests added.
  (if needed)
- [x] Documentation and `whatsnew.rst` updated.
  (if needed)
- [x] `setup.py` and `requirements.txt` updated with new dependencies.
  (if needed)
- [x] Type annotations added.
  (if a function is added or modified)
- [x] All CI tests pass.

Current status of the implementation. The counts are from #427 and are w.r.t the 1,340,936 checked article NXML files.

Tag | Count | Done | Comment
--- | --- | --- | ---
xref | 60,339,251 | ✅ | 
italic | 32,686,526 | ✅  | 
sup | 15,877,780 | ✅  | 
sub | 9,796,718 | ✅  | 
bold | 7,183,035 | ✅  | 
inline-formula | 1,462,973 | ✅ | Replacing by `FORMULA`
ext-link | 1,382,712 | ✅ | Replacing by `URL`
fig | 840,142 |  | Probably need to handle ‼️ 
list | 724,159 |  | Probably need to handle ‼️ 
table-wrap | 489,548 |  |
